column4: A howto for a game tells me to "Killing your window manager at this point can help out with performance,     and prevent wacky things from happening (like switching virtual   desktops)."
you have 4 boxes in your taskbar, by default.
if they're not there, 'ctrl-left' and 'ctrl-right' will switch between them
pardon me. i just realized what i typed
and what are the specs of your pc?
I have 1, 4 ghz 512 mb ram hp laptop
i wouldn't kill your window manager. that's just silly.
shouldnt it give me more systemresources?
yeah, but your window manager powers your desktop, so, unless you plan on running it in the terminal...
then again, i'm not familiar with that game, so
